PositionHistory.Title: Analyst
PositionHistory.Description:
HSBC (Global Analytics centre) Analyst May 2014 -Present
* Using analytical tools to identify scenarios and build models using concepts of Segmentation, clustering, account risk scoring and investigate breach of regulatory guidelines and money laundering activities of the Customers of the Organization. * Simultaneously worked on SAS, Teradata, Spotfire, excel to develop models that help in identifying money laundering activities. * As an analyst, interacting with HSBC Business Partners, understanding their requirements, data and develop/recommend appropriate algorithms and models for effective Anti-money laundering. * Imparted Business and Technical training on new models that were developed by our team under Compliance Structure.

PositionHistory.Title: Section Officer
PositionHistory.Description: IT and Software Development Centre at C.G.D.A Section Officer July 2011 - June 2012 * Worked in National IT projects named Dolphin and Skylark on JAVA, SQL platform * Imparted IT training to officers in Defence Accounts Department * Developed JAVA modules and customized web interfaces on Army based monthly PBOR pay system. * As a Section Officer, Interacting with Army Officers, understanding their payment systems and accordingly implement the changes in the system. Key Achievements

PositionHistory.Title: Underwent Intensive Departmental Management Training
PositionHistory.Description: * Underwent Intensive Departmental Management Training at Meerut 2012 * Part of the Dolphin project which was awarded 'RAKSHA MANTRI' Award from defence minister Sh. A.K. Antony 2011

PositionHistory.Title: Associate Software Engineer
PositionHistory.Description: Avaya India Pvt. Ltd. Associate Software Engineer June 2009 - June 2011 * Resolved business critical cases of EMEA customers pertaining to enterprise communications systems * Direct interaction with the Business Partners of AVAYA and recommend or Suggest appropriate communications systems in liaison with the sales team. * Worked on Services such as Unified Communications, contact centers and other enterprise communication systems * Responsible for recruitment of new engineers for business operations * Played the role of incidence management for the EMEA region Key Achievements * Selected for an Advanced Training Program on new server technology of Nortel held in China * Received the "You Made a Difference" award * Certified in Nortel Technology as technology specialist, technology expert & support specialist

PositionHistory.Title: SUMMER INTERNSHIP
PositionHistory.Description: SUMMER INTERNSHIP * Convergence International Network Technologies Apr 2013- May 2013 Dealer Network Development using Marketing strategy for Convergence International Network Technologies * Develop a Marketing strategy for CINT to enter in to the retail market. * Build Dealer Contacts in NCR Region and promote the CINT products.

ACADEMIC PROJECTS CBIT, Hyderabad * Electronic Nose 2008 * Used sensors, microcontroller concept to understand the impact of electronic nose in society * Presented a technical paper on the same at MGIT and ASTR academy * Developed a robot and participated in Robomaniac-Pokemon competition at MGIT 2008
IIM, Rohtak
* Dalmia Healthcare * Conducted a marketing survey for the market entry of a Dalmia product in the OTC segment * Analysed quantitatively the feasibility of the success of the product.
* A study on Siebel Implementation in Tata Motor's Dealer Management Systems * Studied various parameters involved during ERP selection, implementation methodology & challenges of Siebel as DMS at Tata Motors. Directly interacted with the Technology Architech at Tata Motors and analyzed various process changes occurred during implementation. Analyzed the impact of Siebel implementation on process improvements and sales.
Zenesys Consulting
* Competitive Landscape analysis for Start ups in Various Domains * DigiMarketing: More screens more flexible technology. Way ahead
POSITIONS OF RESPONSIBILITY

PositionHistory.Title: Coordinator
PositionHistory.Description: Coordinator, IRIC Committee at IIM Rohtak 2012 * Responsible for interacting with industry personnel for guest lectures and live projects

PositionHistory.Title: Member
PositionHistory.Description: Member, HR Summit at IIM Rohtak 2012 * Responsible for onstage monitoring and assisting the invited guests

PositionHistory.Title: Volunteer
PositionHistory.Description: Volunteer, Marathon for Girl Child 2012 * Responsible for assisting the participants for registration and monitoring the campaign run.

PositionHistory.Title: Volunteer, CXO Summit
PositionHistory.Description: Volunteer, CXO Summit at IIM Rohtak 2012 * Responsible for assisting the invited guests at the campus

PositionHistory.Title: Member
PositionHistory.Description:
Member, Management Conclave at IIM Rohtak 2012 * Responsible for execution of the smooth conduct of the event being an IRIC member.
KEY ACHIEVEMENTS AND SKILLS * Certified as Google Adwords Professional in 2013, May * Certified as Google Analytics Professional in 2013, June * Selected for the regional round of Hult Global Challenge 2013, Shanghai * Proficient in the area of SAS Statistical Business analysis * Proficient with working of SPSS * Secured a place in Student leadership Board (Topping the course) twice in the first two trimesters of Zenesys Consulting.

PositionHistory.Title: Coordinator
PositionHistory.Description: Coordinator, "COMMUNICANDO" at CBIT 2007-09 * The club is responsible for developing and enhancing various personality development skills of CBIT students

PositionHistory.Title: Member
PositionHistory.Description: Member, Organizing Committee in "SHRUTHI" at CBIT 2008 * Organized intra college General Knowledge Quiz event

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: SRINIVAS P RAJU's experience appears to be concentrated in Information Technology / Programming, with exposure to Marketing / Data & Analytics. SRINIVAS P RAJU has 8 years of work experience, with little or no management experience.
